comment.author: 75507762@N05
comment._content:
I would love this photo just to place up on my neighborhood street to get the drivers to slow down and drive more cautiously.

What might I do to get to re-print this wonderful photo?

comment.author: 47290943@N03
comment._content:
[http://www.flickr.com/photos/75507762@N05] For your own use, no problem at all, just download one of the larger sizes. If you're blogging it, etc. please just acknowledge the National Library of Ireland, and provide a link back to this image...

Just as with the children above, we only ask that you play nice with our photos!  :)
comment.authorname: National Library of Ireland on The Commons

comment.author: 32162360@N00
comment._content: [As seen on the TV3 program] The sign must have worked - they built York road over the wall to take the traffic away. But now the locals are concerned about dog poo! GoogleStreetView - g.co/maps/xtsnb

comment.author: 47290943@N03
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/beachcomberaustralia] How posh are we? Now we get to say that some of our Flickr photos are "as seen on TV"!  :D
